overview: The story tells that the developer An Dong Qian wants to demolish He Qian Qian's Grandma's old house to build a villa area. In order to prevent An Dong Qiang from demolishing the old house, He Qian Qian returned to the old house with her classmate Jiang Jia Qi in the summer vacation. Her first love Wang Xiao Feng and a group of junior high school students accompanied her to come up with a way to invite the fairy to scare the developer away. , Weird events happen one after another, people tremble, what unknown fear is waiting for them.
title: Bunshinsaba vs Kayako
